value:
$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... This way. Triandra and
Mirabilis should be just ahead...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I-is anyone there? Please, help!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, Mirabilis!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Peony! I'm so glad to see you!$k$p$EFace_Pain|But Triandra... She's hurt...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no, Triandra!$k$pYour poor wings... You must be
in pain...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...will be fine... What's important
is that we find...Lady Freyja.$k$pWe álfar cannot face nothingness
without her.$k$pOnly Freyja, as the ruler of dreams,
can stand against nothingness...$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I was told...not even Freyja herself
could have hope of winning.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...Who's this? Another child trapped
in this dream?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|This is Eitr. She was brought here
like we were—and just as suddenly.
Isn't that right, Eitr?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Y-yes...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|What's the matter?$k$pYou're all right now. You don't
need to be scared. This is Triandra,
and this is Mirabilis. They're friends!$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I believe you, but...well, there is
something I must tell you all...$k$pBefore I do, know that I am not
your enemy. And...please don't
leave me behind.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Of course! I won't leave you.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I'm glad we could reunite with
your friends, but...please be careful.$k$pIt's possible a dream-eater has
taken their shapes...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I don't think I've heard of
dream-eaters before...$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|They are creatures of nothingness
and serve its ruler.$k$pThey have no form of their own.
Instead they nest within dreams
and take any shape they please...$k$pThe dream-eaters destroy the
dream from the inside.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's terrible! If there are monsters
from the nothingness in this dream
with us, we'll need to be on guard...$k$pThank you, Eitr.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|It's possible that...the dream-eater
is already among us.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...Huh?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|...Why wait to tell us that now?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I-I'm sorry! I thought you might not
believe me... I was so scared you'd
turn me away...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|...Or perhaps you wanted to sow
seeds of doubt among the álfar.
Is that it?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|N-no! I...I only want to help you...$k$pI'm sorry! Please don't be angry...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Don't cry, Eitr. I believe you, sweetie.$k$pIf any dream-eater dares show itself,
the rest of us will team up and send it
back where it came from, all right?$k$p

$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|*sniff*$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How long are you going to keep
being this weepy?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I can't help it... Y-you think of me
as an enemy...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Naturally. If what you say is true,
the nothingness may well be lurking
among us, taking álfr form...$k$pI could be a dream-eater for all
you know.$k$pIf that's enough to make you cry,
you are weak... I know, because...
I was weak too, when I was a girl.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Y-you were a girl? A...human girl?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...When I was young, I knew someone
like you. Being around you reminds
me of her. I find it annoying.$k$p$EFace|Toughen up. Otherwise, you may
not survive long enough to grow
out of it.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I know... A pathetic weakling like
me can't even—can't even... *sob*$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$EFace|I detest whiny children... How about
this: if you'll stop crying, I'll tell you
something someone once told me...$k$pSomeone I love and respect above
all others—Lady Freyja.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|*sniff* ...Lady...Freyja?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That's right. Now, listen to me,
and I'll tell you what she told me...$k$p"Crying doesn't accomplish anything."$k$p"If the world causes you pain, you
must change either yourself,
the world, or both."$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Do you understand? There is nobility
in the lesson... A kind strength hides
between the words, if you listen...$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I-I'm sorry... I don't think I know
what you mean...$k$pBut thank you. I know...you meant
to cheer me up.$k$pI have to change... Otherwise, I...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It seems to me you're beginning
to understand.$k$pLady Freyja's words have the power
to change a person's heart and mind.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I will do all I can to help you.$k$pThank you, Plumeria... Would it be
all right if I were to...hug you?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what? Th-that would be, er...$k$pI understand Lady Freyja's words
have had an impact on you, but such
affection is far beyond what I deem—$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|I'm sorry... I don't know what it
means, but I just have this feeling I...$k$pI have something to give you.
There is power in me, and I think
I can...share it with you.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Only a god could be capable of such
a thing. Just who are you?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|That even I don't know... Everything
is confused in my memory...$k$pBut I do know I want to be
your friend.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|I have no doubt of that now, with
Lady Freyja's words at work in
your heart...$k$pAnd since that is the case...
I suppose you can have that hug.$k$pQuickly. Before I change my mind.$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Thank you, Plumeria.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_魔器プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Weapon01,Face|$Fi1500|This is...$k$pThis feels like when Lady Freyja and
Dream-King Freyr gave us dream
nectar and we became álfar...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|The power of a fresh dream is
swelling within me...$k$pEitr... What is this? What's happening
to me?$k$p$WmMEID_魔器アイト,ch00_52_Eitr_F_Weapon01,Face|Someone's approaching...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|G-get behind me. It may be
a servant of the nothingness...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Plumeria... Can you hear me?
Where are you, Plumeria?$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|That voice... I-it can't be...$k$p$WmMPID_フレイヤ味方,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ah, there you are, Plumeria.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|...L-Lady Freyja!$k$p

$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Hah! Here we go, here we go!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Wow! I can hardly see your kite
it's so high! That's amazing,
Princess Dagr.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Heh. Yeah, well, it's a bit easier to
catch the wind when you're this tall.
Call it a natural gift!$k$pBut I wish I could fly around the skies
like the kite does... I'm kinda jealous
of you, Catria!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Do you want to try riding
my pegasus?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|I don't want to crush your poor
pegasus or anything, so I'll just
stick to solid ground, I think...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Heehee... I know I love the feeling
of flying, so I'm sure you'd love
it too.$k$pWhile you're up there, above the
clouds, you can forget everything
and let your worries fall away...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Huh? What worries? You always
seem so...relaxed!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Call it a natural gift... But yes, I do
have worries. All sorts, in fact.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|What? Seriously?! Have you tried
talking to anyone about them?
I mean...I'm here.$k$p

$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Damn! What a story! I'm sorry all
that happened... Unrequited love
is always messy.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Princess Dagr! Shhh! Not so loud...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Don't worry! No one can hear
anything we're saying over all
this wind anyway! *wink*$k$pI wish I had some advice for you,
but romance has never really been
one of my strengths...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|That's all right. I don't necessarily
want to do anything about it.$k$pI'm just waiting for the day I see
him and my heart doesn't hurt.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Catria! You're killing me!$k$pC'mere. You need a hug!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Princess Dagr! I-I can't breathe...$k$pMmrph... Oh! The kite!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Aw, there it goes... Ah well.$k$pCatria, I hope one day all your worries
float off and away just like that kite.
And that you know...it's OK to let go.$k$pYou can look back on the memories
you created flying it and smile seeing
you're no longer tied to them.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Hmm... I would like that—though
I'm not so sure it'll be as easy as
you make it sound...$k$p
